roleset.name: destroy tissue with an intense laser beam
roleset.note: PHOTOCOAGULATE-V NOTES: Based on Temprel data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from photocoagulate.01-v)

example.name: arg 1 only
example.text: [This-1] was biopsied [*-1]extensively and then photocoagulated and tattooed [*-1].
